mapper.sql: t_house_unlike_log . id , t_house_unlike_log.user_id AS userId, t_house_unlike_log.asset_id AS assetId, t_house_unlike_log.create_time AS createTime, t_house_unlike_log.update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_unlike_log.* FROM t_house_unlike_log WHERE t_house_unlike_log.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_unlike_log.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_unlike_log
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_unlike_log.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_unlike_log.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_unlike_log.asset_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.assetId},'%')
AND t_house_unlike_log.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_house_unlike_log.update_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.updateTime},'%')
AND t_house_unlike_log.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_unlike_log.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY update_time DESC , create_time DESC
